visualDNA: Friendly geometric shapes, optimistic gradients, and warm light pour across collaborative work surfaces. Soft purples and apricots keep things playful while allowing primary actions to pop. Typography leans modern and upbeat.

cardInfo.notes: Pairs well with productivity dashboards or community hubs.
cardInfo.title: Abstract Workspace Pals
cardInfo.description: A cheerful workspace palette that balances lavender primaries, peach highlights, and pill-shaped shadows.

visualDNA: Weathered textures, bold CTA blocks, and trail-mapped backgrounds built for eco brand campaigns and volunteer drives.

cardInfo.title: Activist Rugged
cardInfo.description: Field-ready storytelling kit for campaigns that blend rugged maps, gear callouts, and community action prompts.
cardInfo.notes: Highlight gear checklists, action badges, and partner shoutouts across panels.

visualDNA: Full-bleed video, parallax chapters, and map embeds for documentary storytelling.

cardInfo.title: Cinematic Editorial
cardInfo.description: Scroll-driven narrative design with pull quotes, chapter intros, and immersive media embeds.
cardInfo.notes: Blend parallax chapters, mini cartography, and crossfade transitions.

visualDNA: Masonry inspiration boards, pastel hero bands, and social proof ribbons built for design-sharing hubs.

cardInfo.title: Creative Community
cardInfo.description: A pastel social canvas with masonry cards, creator spotlights, and animated reaction chips.
cardInfo.notes: Use for portfolio hubs, shot comps, or community-driven trend boards.

visualDNA: Black-screen hero rails, neon accent glows, and trailer hover reels shaped for streaming hubs.

cardInfo.title: Dark Cinematic
cardInfo.description: A marquee streaming shell with poster grids, hover trailers, and spotlight typography.
cardInfo.notes: Great for streaming guides, film drops, or episodic storytelling dashboards.

visualDNA: Punchy primaries, strict grids, and industrial typography translate Bauhaus poster energy into a modern visual system built for prototyping studios.

cardInfo.notes: Perfect for design tooling, creative networks, or editorial dashboards.
cardInfo.title: Digital Bauhaus Atelier
cardInfo.description: A structural palette of vivid orange, cobalt, and golden accent blocks anchored by soft cream surfaces.

visualDNA: Magazine-grade whitespace, serif headlines, and muted photography with patient transitions.

cardInfo.title: Editorial Minimal
cardInfo.description: A magazine-inspired palette favoring calm photography, measured typography, and deliberate pacing.
cardInfo.notes: Lean on asymmetric grid modules, generous whitespace, and disciplined drop caps.

visualDNA: Dark mode, monospaced heads, and generative gradients for speculative design R&D spaces.

cardInfo.title: Futurist Lab
cardInfo.description: Glowing lab terminals, gridded schematics, and code-forward storytelling for advanced prototypes.
cardInfo.notes: Use animated grid overlays, diagnostic widgets, and telemetry glyphs.

visualDNA: Midnight glass, holographic glow, and precision serif accents for flagship tech unveilings.

cardInfo.title: Futurist Luxury
cardInfo.description: Dark glass panels, holographic accents, and meticulous typography crafted for premium vehicles.
cardInfo.notes: Use floating cards, gloss reflections, and spec callouts with headline serifs.

visualDNA: Dark nebula backdrops, electric gradients, and glass-card panels echo high-velocity product launches and code-forward storytelling.

cardInfo.notes: Pair with glassmorphism overlays and command palette interactions.
cardInfo.title: Gradient Tech
cardInfo.description: A neon-gradient system for product teams that live between command lines and launch films.

visualDNA: Dark glam hero reels, oversized serif headlines, and subtle neon reveals for runway moments.

cardInfo.title: High-Fashion Immersive
cardInfo.description: Edge-to-edge video, oversized fashion type, and moody overlays for couture storytelling.
cardInfo.notes: Deploy hover reveals, editorial split layouts, and dramatic lighting cues.

visualDNA: Mascot-driven scroll hijinks, comic-book bursts, and tongue-in-cheek CTA gags stitched into a parallax ride.

cardInfo.title: Humorous Parallax
cardInfo.description: A comedic storytelling shell packed with mascot reveals, comic bubbles, and gag-timed parallax beats.
cardInfo.notes: Use oversized speech bubbles, stuntman scroll triggers, and wink-to-camera tooltips.

visualDNA: Soft blues, human-centered iconography, and WCAG-conscious contrast for equitable dashboards and reports.

cardInfo.title: Inclusive Data-Viz
cardInfo.description: Accessible chart language focused on clarity, empathy, and annotations that include every reader.
cardInfo.notes: Pair with large-legibility typography, icon legends, and guided narration modules.

visualDNA: Neon marquees, art-deco frames, and jewel gradients pulsing through animated headline tunnels.

cardInfo.title: Kaleidoscope Deco
cardInfo.description: An electric deco rave of marquee borders, jewel gradients, and animated typographic arches.
cardInfo.notes: Layer shimmering CTA frames, marching marquee lights, and stacked deco glyphs.

visualDNA: Edge-lit typography, diagonal action lines, and cinematic color blocking that choreographs hero videos with stat callouts.

cardInfo.notes: Use diagonal masks, burst counters, and timed scroll steps.
cardInfo.title: Kinetic Story
cardInfo.description: A motion-forward palette tuned for sports, music, and campaign storytelling with punchy contrast.

visualDNA: Neutral canvas, editorial photography, and slender serif touches for high-end product catalogs.

cardInfo.title: Luxe Commerce
cardInfo.description: A refined retail palette with light neutrals, delicate grids, and product-focused hero blocks.
cardInfo.notes: Pair with sticky filters, magnified product frames, and editorial copy modules.

visualDNA: Velvet-black canvases, gilded filigree, and jewel-glow spotlights staged for couture spectacle moments.

cardInfo.title: Luxury Maximal
cardInfo.description: Opulent black-and-gold storytelling with baroque borders, neon gemstone flares, and indulgent typography stacks.
cardInfo.notes: Layer gold-foil dividers, animated jewel flares, and slow-bloom CTA glows.

visualDNA: Calm grayscale surfaces, modular blocks, and subtle iconography built for focus-first documentation flows.

cardInfo.title: Minimal Monochrome
cardInfo.description: A focus-first doc aesthetic with balanced grays, modular blocks, and quiet motion cues.
cardInfo.notes: Ideal for wikis, knowledge bases, and productivity canvases that need calm clarity.

visualDNA: Moody synthwave gradients, holographic accents, and glassy panels built for late-night creation sprints. Electric cyan and magenta pulse against deep indigo shadows.

cardInfo.notes: Ideal for music apps, live collaboration rooms, or nightlife communities.
cardInfo.title: Midnight Neon Hideout
cardInfo.description: A neon-drenched toolkit with glass panels, cyan glows, and analog synth mood.

visualDNA: Pure black-and-white interface, monospace snippets, and grid cards tuned for developer-first experiences.

cardInfo.title: Monochrome Code
cardInfo.description: Minimalist dev tooling palette with grid consoles, CLI callouts, and terminal chic.
cardInfo.notes: Use split panes, ASCII dividers, and dark-light toggle previews.

visualDNA: Raw monochrome shells, thick outlines, and unapologetic HTML vibes with utility green accents.

cardInfo.title: Neo-Brutalist
cardInfo.description: Blocky layouts, hard borders, and limited color for maximal attitude.
cardInfo.notes: Pair with oversized CTAs, monochrome galleries, and no-frills forms.

visualDNA: Fluoro palette, layered GIF energy, and glitch edges designed for chaotic culture drops.

cardInfo.title: Neon Maximalist
cardInfo.description: A kaleidoscopic kit with glow typography, gradient halos, and rave-ready UI treatments.
cardInfo.notes: Stack marquee text, animated stickers, and aggressive hover flashes.

visualDNA: Primary colors, WebGL bricks, and hover bounce interactions for gamified interfaces.

cardInfo.title: Playful 3D
cardInfo.description: Chunky shapes, bubbly typography, and playful motion for kid-friendly 3D interfaces.
cardInfo.notes: Deploy floating blocks, perspective cards, and bounce easing on hover.

visualDNA: Chunky vector doodles, pastel punch, and asymmetric tiles that keep microcopy cheeky and approachable.

cardInfo.notes: Layer blobby backgrounds, wavy dividers, and anthropomorphic icons.
cardInfo.title: Playful Illustration
cardInfo.description: A pastel-forward system with bubbly typography and sticker-like depth for whimsical products.

visualDNA: Bright blocks, animated stats, and share-card ready colors for energetic metrics stories.

cardInfo.title: Pop Data-Viz
cardInfo.description: Punchy gradients, stacked stats, and shareable cards for recap moments.
cardInfo.notes: Use animated number counters, sticker legends, and export-ready layouts.

visualDNA: Plain HTML scaffolding, system typography, and bold inline links for frictionless checkout funnels.

cardInfo.title: Raw Commerce
cardInfo.description: A stripped-down sales shell with system fonts, high-contrast buttons, and bold inline receipts.
cardInfo.notes: Lean into single-column stacks, trust badges, and no-nonsense call-to-actions.

visualDNA: Butterscotch browns, chunky throwback type, and striping accents that cue late-70s fast food nostalgia.

cardInfo.title: Retro Revival
cardInfo.description: A groovy heritage palette with Cooper-inspired headlines, wavy stripes, and grainy filter overlays.
cardInfo.notes: Stack badge buttons, throwback coupons, and animated ribbon wipes.

visualDNA: Space-black hero panels, telemetry overlays, and orbiting 3-D models ready for mission control narratives.

cardInfo.title: Scientific 3-D
cardInfo.description: A cosmic telemetry shell with orbit paths, data HUDs, and immersive model showcases.
cardInfo.notes: Use for mission dashboards, product replicas, or exploratory science stories.

visualDNA: Earth-toned gradients, slow fades, and fragrance-first storytelling for boutique experiences.

cardInfo.title: Sensory Editorial
cardInfo.description: Muted perfumes of color, indulgent typography, and cinematic ambient energy.
cardInfo.notes: Use soft vignette overlays, slow dissolve transitions, and delicate pull quotes.

visualDNA: Scrap-book edges, taped photos, and warm skeuomorphic layers for narrative timelines.

cardInfo.title: Skeuo-Story
cardInfo.description: A tactile storytelling kit with torn paper edges, pushpins, and artifact callouts.
cardInfo.notes: Use notebook backdrops, pinned badges, and timeline sliders with haptic cues.

visualDNA: Tight baseline systems, Helvetica clarity, and disciplined red bar accents for precision editorial layouts.

cardInfo.title: Swiss-Grid
cardInfo.description: A modular grid kit with numeric gutters, signaling red rules, and annotated legends.
cardInfo.notes: Overlay baseline toggles, typographic scales, and time-stamped caption labels.

visualDNA: Airline precision, timetable grids, and crisp pictograms anchored by confident primary red.

cardInfo.title: Swiss Modern
cardInfo.description: A transport-grade UI kit with wayfinding icons, precise alignments, and reserved blues.
cardInfo.notes: Introduce flight-status panels, perforated ticket cards, and responsive timetable stacks.

visualDNA: Cathedral whitespace, surgical typography, and precision grayscale with only intentional accent pulses.

cardInfo.notes: Lean on macro white margins, hairline dividers, and soft fade transitions.
cardInfo.title: Ultra Minimal
cardInfo.description: A grayscale-first theme that lets product photography and subtle motion carry the narrative.

visualDNA: Kaleidoscopic gradient washes, energetic blobs, and playful UI tokens.

cardInfo.title: Vibrant Gradient
cardInfo.description: Luminous blends, floating cards, and upbeat copy built for expressive brands.
cardInfo.notes: Use layered gradient blobs, animated transitions, and confetti UI.

visualDNA: Sepia draped palettes, collage vignettes, and serif-led storytelling with museum-grade detailing.

cardInfo.notes: Use patina textures, collage masks, and slow crossfades.
cardInfo.title: Vintage Luxury
cardInfo.description: Old-world glamour with gold-leaf warmth and heirloom typography for prestige brands.
